snippet: As the Conservative-led government of David Cameron proposes a compromise that leaves both sides cold, France's ruling Socialists throw their weight behind a march this weekend in Paris in support of same-sex marriage rights.
abstract: As the Conservative-led government of David Cameron proposes a compromise that leaves both sides cold, France's ruling Socialists throw their weight behind a march this weekend in Paris in support of same-sex marriage rights.

headline.main: Gay Marriage Fight Intensifies in Britain and France

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
